input.sentences: at the party everyone had brought their guitars .
they played all the songs that they knew .
the family sat and listened to the play .
then everyone sat and shared stories with each other .
after that the kids sat to play video games .
output.sentences: Just an easy day,visiting old friends from the neighborhood.
A little jamming;just like old times when we were in a band together
My kids aren't too sure what to make of us.
This group of friends is trying to decide what to do for excitment.
Cousin Jack has it figured out:cartoons!
